title.narrative: Feasibility study in preparation for a GCF-project

description.narrative:
To contribute to the Paris Agreement’s goal of climate neutrality at home and abroad with Danish knowhow and technology in order to produce more food for more people on less land to free up space for carbon sequestration and enhance biodiversity.
DAFC seeks to explore the feasibility and possible scope of transfer of climate smart knowhow and technology in practice, and if the cooperative model of agriculture and forestry business organization can become a transformative actor for change in develop-ing countries’ climate action in the fields of agriculture and forestry.
If the project proposal for the Lake Victoria Region is approved, it might serve as noted by the Kenya GCF-NDA as tangible climate action in support of the Kenya NDC as re-gards mitigation of greenhouse gas emissions from agriculture, carbon sequestration by means of removals towards domestic 2030 targets, and climate adaptation.
